help.subtitle: A simple, privacy-focused decision-making tool that helps you choose from multiple options randomly.

howToUse.step1: Enter your options in the text fields (at least 2 choices required)
howToUse.step2: Click the 'Decide for Me!' button to make a random selection
howToUse.step3: Get your result instantly with a fun animation!

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.description: We do not collect, store, or transmit any personal data. All your choices and decisions remain completely private and are processed locally in your browser.

localStorage.title: Local Storage
localStorage.description: The app may use your browser's local storage to remember your language preference and improve your experience. This data never leaves your device.

ads.title: Advertisements
ads.description: This app displays advertisements to support its free operation. We work with trusted ad networks that respect user privacy and do not collect personal information beyond what's necessary for ad delivery.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.description: We do not use any third-party tracking services, analytics, or data collection tools. Your privacy is our top priority.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or how we handle your data, please feel free to contact us through our support channels.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.warningText: This app is designed for entertainment and lighthearted decision-making only. Results are completely random and should not be considered as serious advice.
disclaimer.mainText: Make a Pick is a fun tool designed to help you make random selections from your options. While it can be useful for simple choices like what to eat or which movie to watch, it should never be used for important life decisions.
disclaimer.doNotUseTitle: Do NOT use this app for:

doNotUse.critical: Any critical life decisions that could impact your wellbeing

disclaimer.responsibilityText: You are solely responsible for any actions you take based on the results from this app. Always use your own judgment and common sense when making decisions.
disclaimer.enjoyText: This app is meant to be enjoyed! Use it for fun choices, breaking ties in casual discussions, or when you simply can't decide between equally good options.
